img_text: BLOCK TROLLS They are not here to exchange ideas. They are not here to learn or to be educated. They are not here to engage in ANY form of proper discussion. Their only purpose is to spread lies and harm you When you see a troll, document, report, and block it immediately If we cut them off, they will have less space to harm others. Help make social media safe again. Block trolls. buperficial Gazette
